empty_summary_span_msg.title: Nothing highlighted
empty_summary_span_msg.text: You didn't highlight anything in the summary.

default_too_short_summary_msg.title: Summary span too short
default_too_short_summary_msg.text: The highlighted summary span is missing information.

default_too_long_summary_msg.title: Summary span too long
default_too_long_summary_msg.text: The highlighted summary span is too long.

default_redundant_alignment_msg.title: Irrelevant information
default_redundant_alignment_msg.text:
You highlighted redundant information in the document.
Reminder: to un-highlighting - hold the ctrl (alt for MacOS) key while simultaneously "highlighting".

default_good_summary_span_msg.title: Well Done!
default_good_summary_span_msg.text: The span you chose is very good! Now proceed to find its alignment.

default_good_alignment_msg.title: Good Job!
default_good_alignment_msg.text: The alignment you chose is very good!

submitted_msg.title: You Are All Set!
submitted_msg.text:
Great Job! You are now ready to start annotating.
Hit "ANNOTATION" to begin.
You can also redo the Guided Annotation by pressing "REDO".
Remember: you can always go back to the Tutorial or redo the Guided Annotation if you forget anything, through the navigation bar at the top of the page (press the "SHOW NAVIGATION BAR" button if you are not sure where it is).

extra_to_excess_msgs.text: Reminder: to un-highlight - hold the ctrl (alt for MacOS) key while simultaneously "highlighting".
